name: v2.0252
title: v2 Causality Observations
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0252 ( Causality Observations)

concept.display: Abatement of event after product withdrawn

designation.value: Gebeurtenis trad opnieuw op na herintroductie product

concept.display: Alternative explanations for the event available

designation.value: Gebeurtenis trad op na introductie product

concept.display: Literature reports association of product with event

designation.value: Literatuur vermeldt koppeling van product met gebeurtenis

concept.display: Occurrence of event was confirmed by objective evidence

designation.value: Optreden van gebeurtenis is bevestigd door objectief bewijs

concept.display: Effect observed when patient receives placebo

designation.value: Effect geobserveerd wanneer patiënt placebo krijgt

concept.display: Similar events in past for this patient

designation.value: Vergelijkbare gebeurtenissen in verleden voor deze patiënt

concept.display: Toxic levels of product documented in blood or body fluids

designation.value: Toxische niveaus van product gedocumenteerd in bloed of lichaamssappen
